name: The Westin Boston Seaport District
description: Whether you're traveling far or planning the staycation of a lifetime, make it count at The Westin Boston Seaport District. A vibrant neighborhood in an iconic city, the Seaport District offers rich history, world-famous attractions, and hidden gems for those who want to take the path less traveled. We are close to family-friendly fun at Boston Children's Museum, stunning exhibits at the Institute of Contemporary Art, and much more. Whatever adventure you choose, come home at the end of the day to stylish accommodations with everything you need to recharge for the next one when you book at our outstanding hotel. When you're not out exploring the city, enjoy our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, plush Heavenly® Beds, full-service on-site Starbucks® and casual dining options.Marriott

name: W Boston
description: Immerse in the music, fashion and art of the downtown district. W Boston is a contemporary hotel in downtown Boston, Massachusetts, of style and sophistication. Comfort awaits in boutique, renovated hotel rooms showcasing signature amenities, custom décor and stunning views of our iconic Theatre District. Your enhanced accommodations include slate-finished bathrooms, innovative entertainment technology and custom murals. Savor New England staples and international dishes at the Gallery Restaurant and W Lounge. We also offer vibrant event spaces for any gathering in this historic destination. When you're ready to tackle the city, attend a Broadway show, shop locally or explore celebrated attractions, including Fenway Park, New England Aquarium and Chinatown. Our luxury downtown Boston, MA hotel is refinement redefined.Marriott

name: Seaport Hotel Boston
description: Located on the waterfront in the bustling Seaport District, the AAA Four Diamond Seaport Boston Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with stunning city and harbor views and incredibly convenient access to all major points of interest. Seaport Boston Hotels gracious and accommodating staff provides unparalleled service, and the hotels innovative amenities, including complimentary wireless internet access, service-inclusive policy and complimentary use of Wave Health & Fitness are sure to delight.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport
description: The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport (BOS) is conveniently located 1 mile from Logan Airport, just minutes from downtown Boston. Free 24 hour Airport Shuttle service to airport and Subway/Train Station and daily parking for a fee during your stay. Our tastefully-appointed hotel features modern conveniences suited to the savvy business traveler, along with a great location and amenities to please leisure guests. Spacious new guestrooms boast a long list of guest amenities including Keurig Coffee Makers, generous work surfaces and all rooms are complete with microwaves and refrigerators and Complimentary high-speed internet access. For your convenience, wireless HSIA is available in public areas throughout the hotel. Our guests have full use of our amenities including: indoor heated pool, well-equipped Fitness Center and Hotel features the Garden Grille & Bar on-site as well as many restaurants and retails shops nearby. The Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport has 2,100 square feet of flexible meeting and banquet facilities including 500 square feet of pre-function space and separate Boardroom. Hotel also offers state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment, a Business Center, creative on-site catering services and a professional staff to anticipate your needs and flawlessly execute your successful business conference, training seminar, reception, or gala social event. You Can Count on Us! to provide a great value whether you are traveling on business, a vacation, or weekend getaway to Boston, our courteous hotel team looks forward to welcoming you! Guaranteed!Hilton

name: Courtyard by Marriott Boston Downtown/North Station
description: Our hotel in Downtown Boston features a modern, sophisticated design that marries our urban location with a tranquil energy. At 14 stories with 220 rooms, we have 2500 sq. ft. of meeting space and "The Bistro". We offer breakfast, dinner and a full bar for you to socialize and unwind. Our hotel near North End Boston is conveniently located within walking distance of TD Garden, home of the Boston Celtics and Boston Bruins. Boston’s Financial Center and Government Center are all within close proximity along with major transportation hubs such as Boston North Station, Logan International Airport and all major highways. The Courtyard Boston Downtown North Station places guests in the ideal spot to enjoy all that Boston has to offer.Marriott

name: Doubletree By Hilton Hotel Boston Bayside
description: The DoubleTree by Hilton Boston Bayside is close to Logan International Airport, and a short walk to the "T" Red Line at the Columbia/UMASS station. This convenient Bayside Boston, MA hotel is within walking distance of the JFK Library & Museum and UMASS Boston campus, and less than two miles from the heart of downtown Boston. We’re also near Harborwalk, a jog and bike path along the bay, and Carson Beach in South Boston. The hotel provides frequent complimentary shuttle service to Logan International Airport, Black Falcon Cruise Port Terminal, and the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center. Our complimentary shuttle also provides limited service to select local restaurants nightly, and to the New England Aquarium on Saturday and Sunday. Our guest rooms, suites and executive accommodations boast a long list of amenities, and we offer complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access in the lobby. Work out in our on-site fitness facility, relax over cocktails in the lobby lounge, and enjoy breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily at Marketplace. Our Red Line proximity means you’ll be near Fenway Park, the North End, Boston's Financial District, Theatre District, Chinatown, Beacon Hill, and Back Bay. Visit Beantown's favorite attractions, like Faneuil Hall, Boston Common, the New England Aquarium, or the Old North Church. This comfortable hotel offers ocean and city views from the top floors, upon request. Whether your stay involves work, play, or a weekend getaway, our friendly and courteous hotel staff look forward to welcoming you with our very special, signature warm chocolate chip cookie at check-in. Plenty of parking is available on-site for a reasonable fee.Hilton

name: Mandarin Oriental, Boston
description: This 5-star hotel is located in the historic Back Bay district in Boston. It offers a full-service spa, a gourmet restaurant and a full-service gym. WiFi access is available. Each room at the Mandarin Oriental Boston will provide you with a TV, a mini-bar and designer linens. En suite marble bathrooms feature a bath or shower. Extras include a seating area, a DVD player and cable channels. The on-site spa is one of the only Forbes Five-Star awarded spas in Massachusetts. Guests can also enjoy the on-site French restaurant Bar Boulud as well as cocktails at the hotel's M Bar & Lounge. Other facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Boston include a fitness center, a ticket service and on-site shopping. The hotel is located next to The Shops at Prudential Center, 656 feet from Hynes Convention Center and 984 feet from Prudential Tower. Logan International Airport is 3.7 mi away.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Back Bay/Fenway
description: Our newly renovated all-suite hotel is conveniently located steps away from Fenway Park and is the closest extended-stay hotel to Boston University, Northeastern University, Colleges of the Fenway and the Longwood Medical Center. Enjoy our stunning views overlooking Fenway Park from the only Rooftop Bar in the Fenway neighborhood, making for an ideal starting point before and after a Red Sox game. We are also close to the House of Blues and the all-new MGM Music Hall – both great venues for catching a show! Explore the city of Boston and enjoy some fabulous shopping and dining at the world-famous Newbury Street or at the Prudential and Copley Malls – both just a 20-minute walk away. Stop by the Time Out Market Place and explore dining options from the top chefs in Boston. Alternatively, you can take a bike ride along the Charles River and enjoy the views. Plus, at our hotel near Back Bay Boston, we also have a great indoor swimming pool that is always a big hit for the entire family!Marriott

name: The Charles Hotel
description: Set in the heart of Harvard Square, this luxurious Cambridge hotel combines classic New England style with award-winning dining, elegant guestrooms and 24-hour personalized concierge services. Each of the rooms at The Charles Hotel in Harvard Square offers flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Guests can also enjoy free access to a nearby state-of-the-art fitness center as well as the on-site library and wireless internet access. While staying at the Charles, guests can take advantage of gourmet on-site dining options, such as the vibrant jazz club, the Regattabar. Classic New England cuisine is available at Henrietta's Table and rustic Italian dishes are featured at Benedetto. Popular area attractions, including the famed Harvard University are only moments from the Charles in Harvard Square. A number of charming cafes, shops and restaurants are also easily accessible. Boston city center is a short drive away with on-site car hire services.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
description: Located within steps of the Boston Common and the Public Garden, this Four Seasons has rooms with views of Boston. The hotel has facilities like an indoor pool, fitness center and spa. A flat-screen cable TV is included in every room at the Boston Four Seasons. There are also free toiletries, slippers and a bathrobe in the private bathroom. On-site dining at the Bistro Lounge offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Boston Opera House is 2297 feet from the hotel. The train at Arlington Station is 656 feet away.

name: XV Beacon Hotel
description: Stop at Fifteen Beacon Hotel to discover the wonders of Boston (MA). Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Fifteen Beacon Hotel. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating can be found in selected guestrooms. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center. Fifteen Beacon Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Boston (MA) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston
description: Featuring a bar, Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston is located in the center of Boston, a 4-minute walk from Hynes Convention Center. Offering a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while some rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature city views. At Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston every room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Back Bay, Boston Museum of Fine Arts and Fenway Park. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 5.6 miles from Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Boston Downtown
description: The DoubleTree by Hilton Boston-Downtown Hotel is conveniently located in the heart of Boston's vibrant Theater District, and welcomes each guest with the aroma of a full-service Starbucks and our signature warm chocolate chip cookie. Walk to fabulous performance venues, Boston Common, Boston's Public Garden, Tufts Medical Center and Floating Hospital for Children. Logan International Airport is a short 4.5 miles away from the hotel. The Tufts Medical Center subway "T" stop is steps from the entrance of the hotel and provides convenient access to all Boston has to offer. Once home to the prestigious Don Bosco High School, this hotel has a rich Boston history. Our beautiful, full service downtown hotel boasts oversized standard guest rooms, measuring over 300 sq. ft; along with elevated ceilings and large picture windows. Deluxe guest rooms and suites, many of which have lovely views of Downtown and Back Bay architecture, feature upgraded amenities, extra space and sofa beds, and are ideal for families. Enjoy tastes of New England at Wisteria Restaurant and Lobby Bar, offering a seasonal menu featuring signature local dishes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Our DoubleTree Hotel Boston-Downtown guests enjoy complimentary access to the adjoining state-of-the-art Wang YMCA health club, compete with fitness classes and Olympic-size pool. Our DoubleTree Hotel Boston-Downtown provides an ideal setting for small to medium-sized meetings, with over 2,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space and an accommodating, attentive staff. At the DoubleTree by Hilton Boston-Downtown Hotel, you're also surrounded by a world of cuisines in a variety of fine restaurants, and only moments from the boutiques, shops, and galleries of Newbury Street. Experience all of Boston when you stay at the DoubleTree Boston Hotel, in this premier downtown location. The friendliest hotel team in Boston looks forward to welcoming you and providing old-school hospitality during your stay with us.Hilton

name: InterContinental Boston
description: Historic elegance meets modern luxury at the InterContinental Boston. Our waterfront hotel, located on the Boston Harbor, is one of the city's most celebrated hotels in a truly iconic location. Our beautifully redesigned rooms showcase the Boston cityscape with floor to ceiling windows. Whether hosting an event or relaxing in our Spa InterContinental, you will appreciate the close proximity to Boston’s most sought-after landmarks, like the Boston Tea Party & Ships Museum.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Brookline, MA
description: We are about a mile from Fenway Park outside of the Medical Center Area. There are seven bus stops and four light rail stations within a half mile of our hotel. Beth Israel Deaconess and Jamaica Plain VA Medical Centers are within a mile. Take a tour of Harvard University less than 10 minutes away. We provide a shuttle to the Longwood Medical Area.Hilton

name: The Colonnade Hotel
description: Located in downtown Boston, this luxury hotel is adjacent to the Prudential Center and 1.8 miles from Fenway Park. It features a seasonal rooftop pool and spacious rooms with a 58-inch flat-screen TV. The Colonnade Hotel is a 7-minute walk from Symphony Hall and across from Prudential Train Station. Harvard Yard and Logan International Airport are both a 15-minute drive away. An iPod docking station is one of the modern amenities in every room at The Colonnade. All rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows and a Keurig coffee maker. Sleek black and white décor and a seating area complete each room. Free access to the state-of-the-art fitness center is provided to all guests. The helpful concierge service can help arrange travel details.

name: The Bostonian Boston
description: Situated in the city centre and a five-minute walk from Old State House, The Bostonian Boston provides comfort, convenience and quality service. The hotel also offers a unique viewing point for Faneuil Hall, Boston and Quincy Market. This modern hotel provides an express check-in and check-out feature, a ballroom and valet parking. For families The Bostonian Boston offers supervised child care/activities and babysitting/child services. After a day of sightseeing in the local area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower, and come with bathrobes and a hair dryer. For those who wish to stay close by, the modern restaurant is a great dining option, providing a range of American and seafood dishes. An American breakfast is served each morning. A wide variety of dining options are also found in the area. Local tourist attractions near the hotel include Boston Freedom Trail, Downtown Crossing and TD Garden. The surrounding area is also well known for its shopping.Revato

name: The Lenox
description: Centered in Boston's historic Back Bay area, this boutique hotel features a state-of-the-art gym, award-winning dining and elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi. John Hancock Tower is 5 minutes’ walk away. Each room boasts panoramic views of the Back Bay neighborhood. Flat-screen TVs, a small fridge and plush terry bathrobes are provided. The luxury rooms offer mahogany furniture and crystal lamps. Hotel Lenox offers personalized concierge services and a 24-hour business center. Guests can enjoy Irish food at Sólás, an authentic Boston Irish pub. City-Table restaurant serves contemporary American cuisine made from fresh ingredients. Room service is available 24 hours. The Lenox is 3 blocks from famous restaurants and shops on Newbury Street. Fenway Park baseball stadium is just 1 mile from the hotel and Northeastern University is a 15-minute walk away.
